comments.body:
I'm not very familiar with module plugins - do you need to export this? I'm following:
https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/declaration-files/templates/module-plugin-d-ts.html

Hey, thanks for asking!
Here IMO that is not required, as I'm just augmenting existing module definition without adding new types. Trying to use export here will results in `strict-export-declare-modifiers`, so like [in that line and following](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/karma-coverage/index.d.ts#L13)
